FUT

Directive intensional verbs (selecting subjunctive )
(18) I Ariadne epemine na afisoume {opjondhipote/kanenan} na perasi mesa.
the Ariadne insisted.3sg subj let.1pl FC-person/ API-person subj come.3sg in
`Ariadne insisted that we allow anyone in.'
With kanenan: `Ariadne insisted that we allow someone or other to come in.'
Directive intensional verbs (selecting subjunctive )
(18) I Ariadne epemine na afisoume {opjondhipote/kanenan} na perasi mesa.
the Ariadne insisted.3sg subj let.1pl FC-person/ API-person subj come.3sg in
`Ariadne insisted that we allow anyone in.'
With kanenan: `Ariadne insisted that we allow someone or other to come in.'
Directive intensional verbs (selecting subjunctive )
I Ariadne epemine na afisoume {opjondhipote/kanenan} na perasi mesa.
the Ariadne insisted.3sg subj let.1pl FC-person/ API-person subj come.3sg in
Ariadne insisted that we allow anyone in.
Ariadne insisted that we allow someone or other to come in.

tier.item: Modal verbs
(19) Bori na anapse {opjosdhipote/kanenas} to fos
can.3sg subj lit.3sg FC-person/API-person the light
`Anyone may have turned on the light.'
With kanenas: `Someone or other must havehave turned on the light.' (Notice the
need to chage to epistemic must in the case of someone or other.)
Modal verbs
(19) Bori na anapse {opjosdhipote/kanenas} to fos
can.3sg subj lit.3sg FC-person/API-person the light
`Anyone may have turned on the light.'
With kanenas: `Someone or other must havehave turned on the light.' (Notice the
need to chage to epistemic must in the case of someone or other.)
Modal verbs
Bori na anapse {opjosdhipote/kanenas} to fos
can.3sg subj lit.3sg FC-person/API-person the light
Anyone may have turned on the light.
Someone or other must havehave turned on the light.
(Notice the need to chage to epistemic must in the case of someone or other.)
(20) Boris na dhanistis {opjodhipote/kanena} vivlio.
can. 2sg subj borrow.2sg FCI / API book
`You may borrow any book.'
With kanena vivlio: `You may borrow some book or other.'
